title: [Health] Digital support for reduced alcohol consumption. A digital support tool on your phone can help if you want to reduce your alcohol consumption. Researchers have developed and evaluated a digital tool which helps individuals reduce their alcohol intake on their own.

[Cancer] Cancers and heart disease could be diagnosed more easily with new rapid test: CrisprZyme builds on CRISPR diagnostic tests, which use RNA—the messenger that helps create proteins—to detect biomarkers in biological fluids like blood or urine
